A

activityPaused(Activity) - Method in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETAnalytics
Call this method from your Activity's onPause() method.
activityResumed(Activity) - Method in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETAnalytics
Call this method from your Activity's onResume() method.
activityStarted(Activity) - Method in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETAnalytics
Deprecated. instead, call ETAnalytics.activityResumed(Activity) from your Activity's onResume() method.
activityStopped(Activity) - Method in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETAnalytics
Deprecated. instead, call ETAnalytics.activityPaused(Activity) from your Activity's onPause() method.
addAtributeNamedValue(String, String) - Method in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush
Adds an attribute to current user's Contact model.
addTag(String) - Method in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush
Adds a tag to the current user's Contact model.
AnalyticActivity - Class in com.exacttarget.etpushsdk
Deprecated. Instead of extending AnalyticActivity, you should use ETAnalytics directly. Override your Activity's Activity.onResume() and add the line ETAnalytics.engine().activityResumed(this);. You should also override Activity.onPause() and add the line ETAnalytics.engine().activityPaused(this);.
AnalyticActivity() - Constructor for class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.AnalyticActivity
Deprecated.

pushEnabled - Static variable in class com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush
Deprecated. No longer used for managing push state. Now using a persistent store. Use ETPush.isPushEnabled() in conjunction with ETPush.enablePush(Activity) and ETPush.disablePush(Activity) instead.
